channel.title: Providence on A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content in Providence on A Hugo website

item.title: Providence: Testing and Results
item.description: This post is part of a series on the Providence project at Stack Exchange. The first post can be found here. The Providence project was motivated by our desire to better understand our users at Stack Exchange. So we think we’ve figured out what kind of developers come to our sites, and what technologies they’re using. Then we figured out a way to combine all our features into the Value Function.
